sections.heading: Inquest; surgeons; subpoena; when authorized
sections.text: If the coroner or jury deem it necessary, for the purposes of an inquisition, to summon any surgeons, the coroner shall issue a subpoena for those preferred, the same as for any other witness.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 113, p. 384;R.S.1913, ยง 5680;C.S.1922, ยง 501
